DOC.brief_summary: This non-interventional field study investigate rivaroxaban clinical practice condition stroke prevention prevention non-CNS systemic embolism patient non-valvular atrial fibrillation China .
DOC.brief_title: Xarelto Prevention Stroke Non-central Nervous System Systemic Embolism Patients With Non-valvular Atrial Fibrillation China : A Non-interventional Study
